theJungle:PetSnecko.NAME: Pet Snecko
theJungle:PetSnecko.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. Randomize every card in your hand's cost this turn.
theJungle:PetSnecko.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Randomize every card in your hand's cost this turn.

theJungle:SS_Clouding.NAME: Clouding Spores
theJungle:SS_Clouding.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

theJungle:SS_Bright.NAME: Bright Spores
theJungle:SS_Bright.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add !M! Dazed to your discard pile. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

theJungle:SS_Clumping.NAME: Clumping Spores
theJungle:SS_Clumping.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

theJungle:SS_Leeching.NAME: Leeching Spores
theJungle:SS_Leeching.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Heal ALL enemies for !M! HP. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

theJungle:SS_Toxin.NAME: Toxin Spores
theJungle:SS_Toxin.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Take !M! damage. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

theJungle:EternalShame.NAME: Eternal Shame
theJungle:EternalShame.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, gain 1 Frail. NL Soulbound.
